author: luehe
msg: Added support for 'var' attribute to <jsp:invoke> and <jsp:doBody>

author: luehe
msg: Adpated jasper to modified JSP 2.0 APIs, including the removal of the
TLD elements, and addition of the <fragment> subelement to <attribute>

author: luehe
msg: Added compilation step which determines, for every custom tag, the
scripting variables that need to be declared. For example, if a custom
action is nested, it must not redeclare the AT_BEGIN variables of its
Scripting variables are now generated at the appropriate places,
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch
